extension.name: Membership Pro Articles Restriction
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin check to see whether users can access to an article. Only publish it if you use Membership Pro Articles Restriction Settings plugin to restrict access for subscribers

field.name: redirect_url
field.label: Redirect URL
field.description: URL of the page users will be redirected to when they are not allowed to access to the articles. You should put the url of the subscription plans page on your site into this param

field.name: protection_method
field.label: Protection Method
field.description: Select the method you want to use to protect the article
field.option: Prevent Access to Article Detail Page

field.name: display_articles_in_profile
field.label: Display Articles in Profile
field.description: If set to Yes, the list of articles which subscriber can access to will be displayed in his profile

field.name: allow_search_engine
field.label: Allow Search Engine
field.description: Select to Yes to allow search engine bots to see and index the protected content

field.name: release_article_older_than_x_days
field.label: Release Articles Older Than X Days
field.description: If enter a number here, articles older than this entered number days will be free to access to everyone

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
